pkgmetadata.longdescription: Satellite Derived Water Quality Detection Algorithms // The main purpose of waterquality is to quickly and easily convert satellite-based reflectance imagery into one or many well-known water quality algorithms designed for the detection of harmful algal blooms or the following pigment proxies: chlorophyll-a, blue-green algae (phycocyanin), and turbidity. Johansen et al. (2019) doi:10.21079/11681/35053.
